mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d'), " ~ ", DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')) AS date
SELECT server_id, server_nm FROM SERVER WHERE team_id=#{teamId} AND sttus='ACT01'
SELECT DISTINCT e.event_id AS event_id, e.event_code AS event_code FROM EVENT e, EVENT_MANAGER m WHERE e.server_id=#{serverId} AND m.sttus='ACT01' AND e.event_id=m.event_id

SELECT n.server_id, s.server_nm, n.ip, e.event_code, m.manager_nm, n.msg, n.ntfc_mth, n.ntfcde, n.logde FROM SERVER s, MANAGER m, NOTIFICATION_HISTORY n, EVENT e WHERE n.server_id=s.server_id AND n.event_id=e.event_id AND n.manager_id=m.manager_id AND s.sttus='ACT01' AND m.team_id=#{teamId}

SELECT TT.date as rgsde, IFNULL(CT.cnt, 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -ROWNUM+1 DAY), '%m/%d') AS date FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m/%d') as rgsde ) A INNER JOIN ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM ( SELECT '' UNION ALL SELECT '' UNION ALL SELECT '' UNION ALL SELECT '' UNION ALL SELECT '' UNION ALL SELECT '' UNION ALL SELECT '' ) V, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC LIMIT 7 ) B ON 1 = 1 ) TT LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(rgsde, '%m/%d') AS rgsde, server_id, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM EVENT_HISTORY WHERE server_id=#{serverId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(rgsde, '%m/%d') ) CT ON TT.date = CT.rgsde WHERE TT.date >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 DAY), '%m/%d') AND TT.date <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m/%d') ORDER BY rgsde ASC

SELECT h.event_id AS event_id, e.event_code AS event_code, count(*) AS count FROM EVENT_HISTORY h, EVENT e WHERE h.rgsde > (CURDATE() - INTERVAL 6 DAY) AND h.server_id=#{serverId} AND h.event_id=e.event_id GROUP BY h.event_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(CASE DAYOFMONTH(date) WHEN DAYOFMONTH(SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL '6' DAY)) THEN cnt END),0) as "01", IFNULL(SUM(CASE DAYOFMONTH(date) WHEN DAYOFMONTH(SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL '5' DAY)) THEN cnt END),0) as "02", IFNULL(SUM(CASE DAYOFMONTH(date) WHEN DAYOFMONTH(SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL '4' DAY)) THEN cnt END),0) as "03", IFNULL(SUM(CASE DAYOFMONTH(date) WHEN DAYOFMONTH(SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL '3' DAY)) THEN cnt END),0) as "04", IFNULL(SUM(CASE DAYOFMONTH(date) WHEN DAYOFMONTH(SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL '2' DAY)) THEN cnt END),0) as "05", IFNULL(SUM(CASE DAYOFMONTH(date) WHEN DAYOFMONTH(SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL '1' DAY)) THEN cnt END),0) as "06", IFNULL(SUM(CASE DAYOFMONTH(date) WHEN DAYOFMONTH(SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL '0' DAY)) THEN cnt END),0) as "07" FROM (SELECT DATE(rgsde) AS date, count(rgsde) cnt FROM EVENT_HISTORY WHERE team_id = #{teamId} AND rgsde >= DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -10 day) GROUP BY date)AS a

SELECT server_nm as serverNm, count(*) as count FROM EVENT_HISTORY JOIN SERVER ON EVENT_HISTORY.server_id = SERVER.server_id WHERE DATE(EVENT_HISTORY.rgsde) >= DATE(SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL '6' DAY)) AND EVENT_HISTORY.team_id = #{teamId} GROUP BY EVENT_HISTORY.server_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5

select server_nm as serverNm, count(*) AS count from EVENT_HISTORY JOIN SERVER ON EVENT_HISTORY.server_id = SERVER.server_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(EVENT_HISTORY.rgsde,'%m/%d') LIKE #{date} AND EVENT_HISTORY.team_id = #{teamId} GROUP BY EVENT_HISTORY.server_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5;
